import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Admin=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[formData,setFormData]=useState({username:"",password:""});const[error,setError]=useState("");const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError("");setIsLoading(true);// Simulate a delay to check the performance
await new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,500));const hardCodedUser={username:"shamanTea",password:"shamanTea@123"};if(formData.username===hardCodedUser.username&&formData.password===hardCodedUser.password){alert("Đăng nhập thành công!");localStorage.setItem("USERLOGIN",JSON.stringify(hardCodedUser));navigate("/listmenu");}else{setError("Sai tài khoản hoặc mật khẩu");}setIsLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"login-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u0110\u0103ng Nh\u1EADp"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-form_input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"T\xE0i Kho\u1EA3n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{required:true,type:"text",name:"username",value:formData.username,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-form_input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"M\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{required:true,type:"password",name:"password",value:formData.password,onChange:handleChange})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-form_errorMessage",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:isLoading,children:isLoading?"Đang xử lý...":"Đăng Nhập"})]})});};export default Admin;
